title: What has changed in the remote learning experience? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think much was lost. There is a reason why business personnel brain storm it is to get the best answer for a company When students are in a class they listen to each other and feed off of each other so that a better and more complete education is possible.

Really change many things because online class has no fear to speak teacher and ask doubt many times again and again,another things we can record the class also we have doubt suddenly we have to see the class and clarify ,student have more relaxation time also,easy way to learn and speak boldly
